Thanks!

Note: The Wiki edition's audio is slightly out of sync. Haven't tested the CHD edition yet but am hoping it's better than the Wiki.

@X45JKD - I have finished downloading all 3 and already watched them, and the audio is not out of sync with the video at any spot in any of the 3 files.  The subtitles are out of sync though.  Maybe that's what you meant?
^^^ I mean the Wiki editions are fine - the audio is not out of sync!

Does anyone know what font is used for the retail's hardcoded subs? I'm in the process of making a tutorial on how to encode your own hardcoded subs into this release (for Elvish/English parts), but I also want to show how to style the subs so that they appear with the pretty font/lettering from the movies.

Anyone know what fonts are used? Anyone have any screenshots of the fonts from the retail versions?
thanks hauntnut, i had the subs for the whole movie, but i only needed for the non-english parts. Your subs worked perfectly, thanks again.

If you start downloading this and you see no files and all the peers with 0.0%, don't worry, the torrent will kick in in like 5 minutes or so. this torrent works 100%. its the best version if u don't want to download the 200 something GB EPIC package from DownTYU. Be patient and ENJOY!! BTW, if u want the subs just look a few comments up :D.
